option.dont-stop-desktops: Make this deployment invisible to the users and allow the use of the desktops until they're stopped
option.stop-desktops: Make this deployment invisible to the users and stop all the desktops
option.make-visible: Make this deployment visible so the users of the deployment have access to the desktops
option.keep-csv: Keep the current urls and download the csv
option.reset-csv: Reset the deployment urls (old generated urls will not be available) and download the csv

rdp.once-installed: Once installed, click the 'RDP' button, that will download the virtual desktop file.

option.reset-desktop: Forcing a desktop reset is a dangerous action. It's the equivalent of unplugging it while it's running. If you can, stop it from inside a viewer.
